author: Taylor Herzlich
title: Elon Musk slates launch of Tesla robotaxi service in Austin, Texas for June 22
description: The timing for the Austin, Texas launch could change as Tesla is being “super paranoid about safety,” Elon Musk said.
content:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk said the electric vehicle maker expects to launch its long-awaited driverless robotaxi service in Austin, Texas, on June 22.

author: Andrew Stanton
title: Elon Musk Suffers Polling Blow With Republicans After Trump Feud
description: Some Republicans are changing their tune about Musk after his falling out with the president.
content:
Republican voters view Elon Musk less favorably after his falling out with President Donald Trump last week, according to a new poll.

author: Jordyn Dahl
title: French drivers sue Tesla over Elon Musk’s right-wing politics
description: EV tycoon drives owners to distraction with embrace of far-right positions.
content: In France alone, Tesla sales declined 67 percent in May compared to the same month in 2024, according to data from Frances PFA registrar. The damage isn't limited to boycotts, though, with vandals ta… [+1178 chars]
